answers.answer: Hello,the only way to know is to test.  You need to test FBS and HBA1c.  If you have a home meter you cna also test 2 hours after eating.If your numbers are high then it is really important to be treated to avoid complications of diabetes (you have plenty of people depending on you and you need to be healthy to do this).let us know how you go.

question: Hi was diagnosed 10 years ago as having pre diabetes type 2 and was put on a diet etc , monitored for a few years however in past 4 years havent been back for testing. ( will be soon as fearing worse again) have put on 10 extra kilos and have been working a lot and getting run down. Ive been feeling so tired latey and with it falling asleep un afternoons and having bouts of nausea. I get blury vision on occassions. sometimes get the shakes if havent eaten.Blood sugar level once was 9 when taken .Im in late 30s and work eary mornings and do a lot. Have kids/ famiy etc and dont get much help. Is this age/lifestyle related or possible diabetes ll.
title: Am I Diabetic or just tired
